name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.action.emailParser
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        editor/prompt_message_source:
          label: Message source;
          syntax: text
          default@text:
            From: customer@cerb.example
            To: support@cerb.example
            Subject: This is an example
            
            This is an example message.

  return:
    snippet@text:
      email.parse/{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        output: results
        inputs:
          message@text:
            {{prompt_message_source|indent('      ', 2)}}
        #on_simulate:
        #on_success:
        #on_error:
